title: [Large-Scale] Learning Trajectory-Based Instructional Approach for Fraction Concept Understanding

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical computational skills and elementary understanding of fractions
context.additional_context: A foundational concept reinforcement program for improving mathematical thinking within language education courses for current practitioners.

learning_goals: Learners can apply fraction concepts (equal partitioning, part-whole relationships, magnitude comparison) to real-world scenarios.
Learners can explain fraction operations by connecting visual and mathematical representations.
Learners can establish self-directed learning strategies using a learning trajectory model during fraction problem-solving processes.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
